"Hydrogen produced via electrolysis powered by 100% renewable electricity has zero greenhouse gas emissions" and should be Europe's top priority when supporting a clean hydrogen supply chain, the alliance says in a letter to the Commission . The "choose renewable hydrogen" campaign is supported by 10 companies and associations: Akuo Energy, BayWa r.e., EDP, Enel, Iberdrola, MHI Vestas, SolarPower Europe, rsted, Vestas and WindEurope. Wind and solar power have become the cheapest source of electricity and are expected to play a major role in decarbonising the economy.
